resources.string:
\
This application aims to provide an extra layer of protection to your Android device like never before! It allows the user to make a four step unlock pattern by moving their device in various directions of their choosing. The internal accelerometer sensors make detecting this kind of movement possible and provide an abundance of data. The fun/challenging part is controlling the data from these sensors since it is often very sensitive and noisy.
 
 Contributing members from the team are:


Justin Edse
 Bryan Lewis
 Jesse Barron
 Eric Beiersdorfer
 Charlie King
 Joshua Cassidy
